recipesJson.name: B2B Banana Cream Pie
recipesJson.author: BlackMambaVapes
recipesJson.description: Just Mixed Live On B2B. Amazing creamy banana inhale with a sweet graham crust after tone.

reviews.text: Great mix! Definitely cures the urge for a nice banana cream pie. Thanks for sharing!!

Super good mix!!! The banana cream is delicious here, super soft blanketing banana over a sweet graham crust that really punches through at the end of the vape. I made a 60ml of this and blew threw it in 2 days dude. Delicious.
Awsome creation. I'm really enjoying this vape off the shake. Only will get better after a few days. Well done.
